select ae.eqpmnt_id , ae.eqpmnt_cd , ae.eqpmnt_se , ae.eqpmnt_nm , ae.expln , ae.bzenty_id , ae.tkcg_dept_id , ae.reg_dt , ae.rgtr_id , ab.bzenty_nm_1 , ab.bzenty_nm_2 , ab.bzenty_nm_3 , ccd.code_nm1 as eqpmnt_se_nm_1 , ccd.code_nm2 as eqpmnt_se_nm_2 , ccd.code_nm3 as eqpmnt_se_nm_3 , ( select af.orgnl_file_nm from ams_mnl af where af.eqpmnt_id = ae.eqpmnt_id and af.mnl_se = 'file' order by af.seq limit 1 ) as file_nm , ( SELECT am.mnl_id FROM ams_mnl am WHERE am.eqpmnt_id = ae.eqpmnt_id AND am.mnl_se = 'video' ORDER BY am.seq ASC LIMIT 1 ) AS video_mnl_id from ams_eqpmnt ae left join ams_bzenty ab on ab.bzenty_id = ae.bzenty_id left join kgst.com_code_detail ccd on ccd.code_id = ae.eqpmnt_se where 1=1
and eqpmnt_nm like concat ('%', #{searchEq}, '%')
and bzenty_id like concat('%', #{searchBz}, '%')
and eqpmnt_se = #{searchSe}
order by reg_dt desc

select ae.eqpmnt_id , ae.eqpmnt_cd , ae.eqpmnt_se , ae.eqpmnt_nm , ae.expln , ae.bzenty_id , ae.tkcg_dept_id , ae.reg_dt , ae.rgtr_id , ab.bzenty_nm_1 , ab.bzenty_nm_2 , ab.bzenty_nm_3 , ccd.code_nm1 as eqpmnt_se_nm_1 , ccd.code_nm2 as eqpmnt_se_nm_2 , ccd.code_nm3 as eqpmnt_se_nm_3 from ams_eqpmnt ae left join ams_bzenty ab on ab.bzenty_id = ae.bzenty_id left join kgst.com_code_detail ccd on ccd.code_id = ae.eqpmnt_se where ae.eqpmnt_id = #{eqpmntId}
